Label: Higher latitude chain (Lat 73.5, Long 80.7), Ground-based Vector Magnetic Field at Dikson, Russia, 1 min, AARI network - Oleg Troshichev (Department of Geophysics, Arctic and Antarctic Research Institute)

VariableDescription.Name: thg_mag_dik
VariableDescription.LongDescription: Magnetic field variation B in HEZ vector components
VariableDescription.Header:
